subject: Introduction & Opportunity to Connect
body:
Hi {Name},
I hope you're doing well. My name is {Your Name}. I’ve been following your work at {Company}. I believe my experience in {Skill} aligns with your team's work.
Would you be open to a short conversation?
Best,
{Your Name}

subject: Collaboration Inquiry
body:
Hi {Name},
I admire your work in {Domain}. I would love to explore collaboration possibilities.
Let me know a suitable time to connect.
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: Career Guidance Request
body:
Hi {Name},
I recently came across your profile and was inspired by your career path in {Field}. I would appreciate your guidance.
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: Job Interest Introduction
body:
Hi {Name},
I’m reaching out to express my interest in opportunities in {Department}. My background includes {Key Skill}.
Can we connect?
{Your Name}

subject: Cold DM via LinkedIn
body:
Hi {Name},
I found your profile inspiring! I’d love to connect and learn about your experience in {Industry}.
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: Inquiry for Internship
body:
Hi {Name},
I’m a student pursuing {Degree}. I am seeking an internship at {Company}. I have worked on {Skill/Project}. Could you guide me?
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: Project Collaboration
body:
Hi {Name},
Your project on {Topic} caught my interest. I would love to work with you if you need contributors.
Best,
{Your Name}

subject: Request for Referral
body:
Hi {Name},
I saw that your company is hiring for {Role}. I’m confident my experience aligns well. May I request a referral?
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: Startup Founder Outreach
body:
Hi {Name},
Your startup’s mission in {Sector} is impressive. I'd love to explore ways I can contribute.
Best,
{Your Name}

subject: General Networking
body:
Hi {Name},
Hope you're doing great! I’m looking to connect with professionals in {Field}. Would love to connect.
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: Follow-Up on Previous Email
body:
Hi {Name},
Just following up regarding my previous email.
Looking forward to your response.
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: Checking In
body:
Hi {Name},
Hope you're doing well. Just checking in to see if you got a chance to review my earlier message.
Thank you!
{Your Name}

subject: Follow-Up After No Response
body:
Hi {Name},
I wanted to gently follow up in case my previous email got missed.
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: Reminder for Scheduled Discussion
body:
Hi {Name},
Just reminding about our planned discussion for {Date/Topic}. Please confirm the timing.
Best,
{Your Name}

subject: Follow-Up After Referral Request
body:
Hi {Name},
Following up on my referral request. Kindly let me know if you need additional details.
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: Follow-Up After Interview
body:
Hi {Name},
I enjoyed our conversation recently and just wanted to follow up on the interview status.
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: Follow-Up After Networking Call
body:
Hi {Name},
Thanks again for the call. Following up to see if there are opportunities to collaborate or learn further.
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: Follow-Up on Job Application
body:
Hi {Name},
I wanted to check on the status of my application for {Role}. I remain very interested.
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: Follow-Up With Additional Info
body:
Hi {Name},
Following up and attaching additional information you requested.
Best,
{Your Name}

subject: Polite Nudge
body:
Hi {Name},
Just giving a polite nudge on this.
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: After Interview
body:
Hi {Name},
Thank you for the interview opportunity. I enjoyed learning more about the position.
Best regards,
{Your Name}

subject: After Networking Call
body:
Hi {Name},
Thank you for taking the time to speak with me. I really appreciate your insights.
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: After Referral
body:
Hi {Name},
Thank you so much for referring me. I truly appreciate your support.
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: General Appreciation
body:
Hi {Name},
Just wanted to say thank you for your support and guidance.
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: After Job Offer
body:
Hi {Name},
Thank you for offering me the role. I'm excited and grateful.
Best,
{Your Name}

subject: After Career Advice
body:
Hi {Name},
Thank you for your valuable guidance. It was very helpful to me.
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: Thanking Mentor
body:
Hi {Name},
Thank you for mentoring me. I appreciate everything you’ve shared.
Best,
{Your Name}

subject: After Workshop
body:
Hi {Name},
Thank you for the informative session. I learned a lot.
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: After Conference Meetup
body:
Hi {Name},
It was great meeting you at {Event}. Thank you for the insightful conversation.
Best,
{Your Name}

subject: After Help with Project
body:
Hi {Name},
Thank you for helping me with {Task/Project}. I appreciate it!
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: Negotiation After Offer
body:
Hi {Name},
Thank you for the offer. Could we discuss a possible revision in the salary considering my experience?
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: Counter Offer Request
body:
Hi {Name},
I appreciate the offer. Based on market standards, I would like to request {Amount}. Looking forward.
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: Compensation Package Discussion
body:
Hi {Name},
I would like to discuss the compensation package further to ensure it aligns with my contributions.
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: Benefits Discussion
body:
Hi {Name},
Apart from salary, I’d like to discuss benefits such as insurance, bonus structure, and leave policy.
Thank you,
{Your Name}

subject: Negotiation Based on Experience
body:
Hi {Name},
Given my skills in {Skill} and experience in {Domain}, may we revisit the offered salary?
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: Remote Work + Salary Adjustment
body:
Hi {Name},
Thank you for the offer. Would it be possible to discuss a hybrid/remote option or compensation adjustment?
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: Revisiting Offer After Competing Offer
body:
Hi {Name},
I received another offer, but I’m very interested in this role. Could we adjust compensation to {Amount}?
Regards,
{Your Name}

subject: Request for Joining Bonus
body:
Hi {Name},
Thanks for the offer. Would a joining bonus be possible to support relocation/transition?
Best,
{Your Name}

subject: Stipend Negotiation for Internship
body:
Hi {Name},
I am grateful for the internship offer. May we discuss a stipend adjustment considering living expenses?
Thanks,
{Your Name}

subject: Performance-Based Increase Request
body:
Hi {Name},
I'm happy to accept. Could we include a performance review after {Time} for potential increment?
Thanks,
{Your Name}
